target.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "testStartEnd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "testStartEnd")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["type"] == "finished")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

description: This dashboard shows live load test metrics provided by JMeter, updated bars charts.

options.content: The following panels show aggregated metrics for all requests

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "virtualUsers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meanActiveThreads")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "contrib/jsternberg/rows"
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: count, createEmpty: true)
  |> rows.map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value /[[aggregation]] }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "receivedBytes")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"], mode: "by")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sentBytes")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"], mode: "by")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"])
  |> sum()

successfulPercentages = () => {

countResponseTime=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"])
  |> count()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "runId"])
  
sumerrorCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"])  
  |> sum()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "runId"])
  
  return join(
      tables:{countResponseTime:countResponseTime, sumerrorCount:sumerrorCount},
      on:["runId"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             
             percentage:  1.0 - r._value_sumerrorCount / r._value_countResponseTime      
    }))   
   
}

successfulPercentages()

failuresPercentages = () => {

countResponseTime=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"])
  |> count()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "runId"])
  
sumerrorCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> group(columns: ["runId"])
  |> sum()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "runId"])
  
  return join(
      tables:{countResponseTime:countResponseTime, sumerrorCount:sumerrorCount},
      on:["runId"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             
             percentage: r._value_sumerrorCount / r._value_countResponseTime         
    }))       
}

failuresPercentages()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)   
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "virtualUsers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "meanActiveThreads")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)   
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)   
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "virtualUsers")

get_percent_500 = () => {
fcount_500=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] <= 500)
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> count()
  |> toFloat()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "requestName"])

 count=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> count()
  |> toFloat()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "requestName"])
    
   return join(
      tables:{fcount_500:fcount_500, count:count},
      on:["requestName"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             "Request Name": r.requestName,
             "Response time is <= 500, (%)": r._value_fcount_500 * 100.0/ r._value_count,          
    })) 
}
get_percent_500()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")  
  |> toFloat()
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.9, method: "exact_selector" )

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")  
  |> toFloat()
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "exact_selector" )

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Avg"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Avg", "requestName"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})
  |> keep(columns: ["requestName", "Count"])

  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])

  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Max"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Median"})
  |> keep(columns: ["Median", "requestName"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "90%"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> stddev()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "stddev"})
  |> keep(columns: ["stddev", "requestName"])

tpsCalculator = () => {
count = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> count()
  |> toFloat()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "requestName"])

 integral = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> integral()
  |> toFloat()
  |> group() 
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "requestName"])
  
  return join(
      tables:{count:count, integral:integral},
      on:["requestName"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             requestName: r.requestName,
             TPS: r._value_count / r._value_integral,
             TPM: (r._value_count / r._value_integral) * 60.0,
             TPH: (r._value_count / r._value_integral) * 60.0 * 60.0,        
    }))       
}

tpsCalculator()

failuresPercentages = () => {

countResponseTime=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"] )
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "requestName"])

  
sumerrorCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"] )
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "requestName"])

  return join(
      tables:{countResponseTime:countResponseTime, sumerrorCount:sumerrorCount},
      on:["requestName"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             requestName: r.requestName,
             ErrorRate: r._value_sumerrorCount / r._value_countResponseTime         
    }))       
}

failuresPercentages()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "requestName"])    
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)   
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["requestName",  "errorMessage", "responseCode"]) 
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["requestName", "errorMessage", "responseCode", "_value"])
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["requestName", "responseCode", "errorMessage", "errorResponseBody"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["requestName", "errorMessage", "errorResponseBody", "responseCode", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")  
  |> group (columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sentBytes")
  |> group (columns: ["requestName"])

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "receivedBytes")
  |> group (columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "receivedBytes")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sentBytes")
    |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "processingTime")
  |> group (columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

options.content: The following panels show aggregated metrics for selected request "[[request]]"

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)   
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Response Time. AVG"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)   
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Response Time. MAX"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> toFloat()
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: median, createEmpty: false)   
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Response Time. Median"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latency")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> group (columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: [[aggregation]]s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Latency"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "responseTime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)   
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "errorCount")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == 1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field", "requestName"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation}s, fn: count, createEmpty: false)   
  |> toFloat() 
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value /float(v: ${aggregation})) }))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "requestsRaw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["requestName"] == "${request}")
  |> group(columns: ["requestName", "responseCode"])
  |> toFloat()
  |> sum()

list.label: Individual Request
list.name: request
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.measurementTagValues(
  bucket: v.bucket,
  measurement: "requestsRaw",
  tag: "requestName"
)

title: JMeter Load Test (org.md.jmeter.influxdb2.visualizer) - influxdb v2.0 (Flux)
